gnat.filter.nei
Class LeftRightContextFilter

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.nei.LeftRightContextFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class LeftRightContextFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

Filters out names by looking at tokens to the left and right of it and comparing their occurrence against occurrences seen in a training set for TPs and FPs.

Author:
Conrad

Parameters:
strictFpsModelFile - - model file for strict false positives
nonStrictFPsModelFile - - model file for non-strict true positives
logLikelihoodRatioThreshold - - threshold for the log likelihood
leftContextLength - - consider x tokens to the left
rightContextLength - - consider x tokens to the right
Method Detail

filter

public void filter(Context context,
                   TextRepository textRepository,
                   GeneRepository geneRepository)
Description copied from interface: Filter
The minimum filtering method that has to be implemented. A Run will call this method for each filter in sequence.
Each filter can read and potentially change context, textRepository, and geneRepository in this method.

Specified by:
filter in interface Filter

public void showMeanScore()
